questionTitle: What type of organization is your business?
questionText: Choose the following option to match your business type.
answerText7: Public body (including local governments, Crown corporations, hospitals, public universities, colleges, and schools)

answerText1: Two or more individuals excluding trusts
answerText2: A mixture of individuals, Canadian-controlled private corporations (including cooperative corporations) and registered charities
answerText3: A mixture that includes non-Canadian controlled private corporations
answerText4: A mixture that includes non-profit organizations

answerText1: Canadian-controlled private corporation eligible for the small business deduction

questionTitle: Does your business pay salary, wages, bonuses or other remuneration to employees in Canada?
questionText: There are specific programs announced to support the qualified employers.

questionTitle: How much was your total payroll from 2019?
questionText: The organization's payroll expense in the 2019 calendar year.

questionTitle: Has your business experienced a decline in revenue of 15% or more in March 2020 vs. March 2019 or vs. the average of January and February 2020?
questionText: A federal wage program will offer a 75% wage subsidy to all qualified businesses that have lost 15% or more of their revenue in March due to the outbreak.

questionTitle: Is your business in one of the following industry sectors?
questionText: Government support program is available for certain industry.

questionTitle: Does your business offer a work-sharing program?
questionText: There is a specific measure announced to support businesses to avoid layoffs.
